QuestData.Title: Auchindoun
QuestData.Description: Commander, Gul'dan's favored agent Teron'gor has infiltrated Auchindoun in Talador and has already taken to devouring the countless souls within. We must not let this nefarious warlock gain any further strength.$B$BEnter the holy mausoleum of Auchindoun and rout Teron'gor and the rest of the Shadow Council before more damage is done.
